summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the City Comptroller; establishing a new Chapter in the Seattle Municipal Code to authorize the designation and appointment of delegates to authenticate and certify vouchers, payrolls, and other central financial management system transactions of the City and update vendor file information; authorizing the designation and appointment of deputies to assist the Comptroller in conducting the affairs of such office; requiring the specification of authorized contract signers and the filing of such specification with the City Comptroller; ad repealing Chapter 3.94.SMC.
